tools.name: loki_query
tools.description: Query application logs from Loki. Returns log entries matching your query. Email addresses, user IDs, and IP addresses in results are replaced with consistent tokens (e.g., EMAIL_a8f3c2) for privacy. Use the sessionId from query sanitization to enable token translation.

sessionId.description: Session ID from query sanitization. Required for all queries.

query.description: LogQL query. Examples: {app="freegle"} |= "error", {app="freegle"} | json | level="error", {source="api"} | json | status_code=~"5.."

start.description: Start time - relative (1h, 24h, 7d) or ISO 8601. Default: 1h

end.description: End time - relative or ISO 8601. Default: now

description: Pseudonymized log analysis tools for Freegle support
